data.title: Election Watch
data.text:
Results of the presidential election:

Presidential Candidate: Pedro PIRES

Party: African Party for the Independence of Cape Verde (PAICV)

Second Round Valid Votes Received: 75,828

Second Round Percentage of Valid Votes: 49.43%

First Round Valid Votes Received: 61,389

First Round Percentage of Valid Votes: 46.51%

Presidential Candidate: Carlos VEIGA

Party: Movement for Democracy (MPD)

Second Round Valid Votes Received: 75,811

Second Round Percentage of Valid Votes: 49.42%

First Round Valid Votes Received: 60,472

First Round Percentage of Valid Votes: 45.82%<

Presidential Candidate: Jorge Carlos FONSECA

Party: Independent Candidate

First Round Valid Votes Received: 5,182

First Round Percentage of Valid Votes: 3.93%

Eliminated from the Second Round

Presidential Candidate: David Hopffer ALMADA

First Round Valid Votes Received: 4,936

First Round Percentage of Valid Votes: 3.74%

Eliminated from the Second Round

Of interest:

A runoff election was held between the top two candidates on February 25, 2001, since no candidate received more than 50% of the vote in the first round election.

These election were the third since the introduction of multiparty politics in 1990.

Onesimo SILVEIRA withdrew his candidature less than one week prior to the election.
